_header: Ye that are commons obey your king and lord
Note: Extracted from Barclay’s Lyfe of St. George, lines 1261-1330.
_description: Advice to the several Estates — ten stanzas rhyme royal

BLSl4031.First Lines:
Ye that ar comons obey yovr kynge and lordeObserue vnto hym love
                    and fydelyte…
BLSl4031.Last Lines:
…Whyche techethother the way to paradyceHym selfe to helle
                    walkynge by synne and vyce
